pingball.physics

Class CircleBumper

  • java.lang.Object
    • pingball.physics.Gadget
      • pingball.physics.CircleBumper

  • public class CircleBumper
extends Gadget
    CircleBumper is a type of Gadget that can exist in Pingball. A CircleBumper is by default a filled circle of radius L/2 that a ball can bounce off of. This allows the Gadget to fit completely in an L x L square. Because a CircleBumper is a bumper type Gadget, there is no action directly associated with it.
    Author:
    Erik Nguyen

    • Constructor Detail

      • CircleBumper

        public CircleBumper(Board board,
            java.lang.String name,
            int x,
            int y)
        Creates a circle shaped bumper based on the following parameters.
        Parameters:
        board - the board that this bumper is in
        name - the name of this gadget
        x - the x coordinate of the upper left corner of this bumper, 0 <= x < 20
        y - the y coordinate of the upper left corner of this bumper, 0 <= y < 20
